profile:
Grand Alarms Ltd., a recognized Canadian company conveniently situated within the Greater?Toronto?Area, has built its reputation within the security industry by providing customers with the latest cutting?edge home electronics, whole?home security and information?networking that is designed to fit the modern lifestyle. Since the company’s establishment over a decade ago, Grand Alarms has been the trusted security company of choice to provide first?class security and home automation to customers across Canada.

Certified and active members of both the Home Builder’s Association and the Canadian Security Association, Grand Alarms offers proven solutions designed to equip each home with the amenities and the flexibility that best meet the needs of our customers. By offering industry?leading Smart?Home networking solutions, multi?room Audio Video Distribution, technologically advanced IP Alarm Monitoring components, and state?of?the?art Central Vacuums, home Surveillance components and Garage Door Openers, Grand Alarms has established a long list of dedicated customers who are benefiting from our elite services through?out their home.

Grand Alarms prides itself on providing each customer with an alarm system that is ready for the unexpected by centralizing and routing security to every corner of the home, blanketing it in protection and giving you piece of mind knowing that your family and possessions are secure. With Grand Alarms, every installation is performed by our highly trained technicians ensuring that the set?up and operation of your alarm system is entrusted only to those who can be trusted.

We are dedicated to maintaining a high level of effective and professional customer service in a number of languages that will best suit individual needs. With our cost effective plans and service, and a completely free full lifetime warranty, Grand Alarms continues to be the no. 1 Canadian choice for new homes, residences and businesses of all size.

Grand Alarms Ltd – Home Security solutions that bring comfort to your home and safety to your life.

profile:
Deluxe Alarms provides the best in home alarm systems to protect your home, family and loved ones.  With over a decade of know-how, we are the business families in the greater Toronto and surround areas have trusted for years to keep their homes and families protected. Never worry about your safety when you can have peace of mind delivered with Deluxe Alarms home security. When it comes to your home alarm, you can count on Deluxe Alarms to provide complete 24/7 safety.

Built into our service is the latest in home monitoring systems. We include emergency notification for your home with a fast response time for any kind of emergency from a prowler in your house to an unanticipated flood while you are away from home. 

Our home security alarm systems may also provide peace of mind with our special medical alert system. If you or a loved one is home alone with a health condition or at an age where the ability to call for help could be critical, we can help. This state of the art medical assistance system can aid anyone recovering from illness or facing lost mobility from aging to stay independent but always within reach of medical assistance. It can mean being able to enjoy life to the fullest and still have help available in an instant when needed.

Deluxe Alarms can create the right security package for your home. We offer complete home wiring packages, cell phone connections that allow you to monitor your homes safety from a distance (smart home monitoring), and security certificates that will bring your home insurance down and a wireless security system that works independent of the power grid to keep your home secure even in blackout conditions. We can deliver a home alarm security system for the best security money can buy at an affordable price only from Deluxe Alarms.

******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 
The following is a VERY IMPORTANT PUBLIC SERVICE MESSAGE
 
DISCLAIMER
BY PUBLISHING THIS PUBLIC MESSAGE  EXPECTS 
NO OBLIGATION TO BUY FROM TOTAL SECURITY CO
THIS IS A PUBLIC SERVICE MESSAGE
NOT MEANT TO DISCREDIT ANY COMPANY 
 
Several alarm companies only have SUMMER PROGRAMS? They rent houses and hire large crews of university students which are offered large commissions ($400 to $500 per contract)to get you to sign up.
 
LEARN MORE by Googling "door to door alarm scam".
 
The PRESSURE:
Sales person won't leave even when you tell them to "Leave"
Sales person won't leave when you tell them "No Thanks"
Sales person won't leave when you say "I Already Have Your Products or Service"
Sales person name drops the name of your neighbor and makes it sound like "they signed up" or "they bought one" or "they referred me to you"
Sales person comes to the house several times and won't leave you alone
Sales person offers cheap cameras /chances to win vacations/free groceries for a year .....anything to ENTICE YOU TO SIGN THE CONTRACT
Once the system is INSTALLED you will be LIABLE for the FULL AND COMPLETE VALUE OF THE CONTRACT ( typically 3 years or more)
EARLY TO TERMINATION OF CONTRACT IS LEGALLY REFERRED TO " breach of contract" and customer is more than likely to pay early CANCELLATION CHARGES amounting to over $700 + THE FULL VALUE OF THE CONTRACT 
Failure to. pay could result in collections , small claims and NEGATIVE REPORTING to the Credit Bureau 
 
The SOLUTIONS:
Put Up Your Hand and "Say NO".
Immediately close the door and the sales person will eventually leave.
Tell them "You are Trespassing" and that you are calling the BBB Better Business Bureau, Consumer Protection Branch and the Police if they do not leave.
BBB 1-888-352-7601, Consumer Protection (Local office)
Always Get 3 Quotes for whatever you consider purchasing. This gives you the time to gather information and to check if the "deal" being presented to you is the best option.
Look up reviews posted on social media such as HOMESTARS TWITTER FACEBOOK ETC.
Never Accept Quick Delivery of a product or service. This gives you a cooling off period and more time to gather facts.
If you did proceed with the offer You Have 10 Days to Change Your Mind and CANCEL (and get a full refund). It's the Law in Ontario (Consumers Protection Act)
Create Awareness and Share on Social Media as referred above.
Contact the local media
******************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
 
DISCLOSURE
 
TOTAL SECURITY CO DOES NOT INSTALL ANY EQUIPMENT BOUGHT ONLINE OR FROM ANY VENDOR NOT ASSOCIATED WITH THE COMPANY DUE TO WARRANTY AND SERVICE ISSUES.

TECHSystem Telecommunications              
   We are specializing in: 
 - structured wiring and low voltage cable installation cat5e & cat6, phone jack installation, coaxial TV cable RG6,
 - complete home entertainment :
       - TV wall mount installation with cables concealed in wall,
       - projector installation,
        - home theater installation,
       - audio system installation,              
 - quality cable fishing,
 - outdoor antenna with free HD channels
 - security and surveillance camera systems,
 - intercoms and video intercoms,
 - fiber optic and fusion splicing,
 - troubleshooting, repairs and relocate: phone jacks, ethernet network and cable TV connections.
   We are an insured company with more than 15 years experience. The installation will be done professionally with top of the line technology and the best tools. 
   At your request we will provide for installation: TV wall mounts, projector mounts, glass shelves, HDMI cables, audio optical cables and speaker cables.
    For more details in the telecommunications field and pictures please visit our website http://www.techsystem.ca

profile:
Welcome to David Audio & Video Installations! I have a registered and insured business dedicated to offering reasonably priced and professional audio/video installations catered to your needs and budget in Toronto and the Greater Toronto area.  I can assist with any size job, small to large....from mounting a TV, for example, to installing a complete home theater and/or multi room system.  I as well do pre-wires.  I will gladly install your existing equipment, if that is all you need, or select and purchase everything for you and then install it. If all you want is new equipment without installation assistance, I can help you select it from my suppliers and just deliver it to your door. I offer good quality home theatre, TV and stereo equipment, as well as cables.  I am a conscientious, certified and experienced electronic systems installer.  I am reliable, prompt and thorough and I treat your home with care.  My installation fee is reasonable.  I have suppliers who offer excellent prices on equipment and cables....whatever is needed for your installation.  

****

Please call me at 647-770-5292.  I service Toronto and the GTA.  My hours are flexible and my website is www.davidavi.ca
products: Any needed audio/video equipment such as TV's, receivers, speakers, blue ray players, CD players, etc.
services:
Complete home theatre systems installations and setting up of your equipment for best picture and sound.  Simple hook ups of basic components.    Equipment and cabling upgrading.  Personalized wide ranging service from installing equipment you already own to a more comprehensive service....if you don't
have any equipment and want someone to take care of everything for you, I can personally select, purchase, transport and set up your equipment in your home (or just deliver equipment to your door if that's all you need).  Making your equipment as easy to operate as possible by providing a tutorial and the option of having a single user friendly universal remote programmed.  Integrating your system inconspicuously into your room or making it stand out....having wires looking tidy.  I also do pre-wires.

profile:
Need Home Theater Design? 

We SELL Home Theater PRODUCTS and offer FULL INSTALLATION of them as well !!

Setting up your home theatre can be a confusing and challenging task. Our installers are professional, highly-trained and bring a wealth of experience in the areas of Projection, LCD LED, 3D installation, HDTV, UHDTV, surround sound setups, SONOS Speakers, whole-home audio, structured wiring and universal remote operations - you know, those cool All In One Remotes! 

Home Theater Services

Pre-installation Consultation - We will assess your space to ensure the most bang for your buck! 

Home Theater Design - Turn-key installations offering furniture, renovations, painting, electrical and custom furniture to house your equipment.

Projection Systems - Take movie night to the next level with  1080p / 3D projection systems!

Surround Sound Set-Up - Treat your ears to surround sound and entire home audio solutions!

SONOS Speakers - We offer all of the SONOS lines for the same price as the big box stores. (delivered & set up for orders over $1000)

Universal Remotes - STOP fiddling with silly remotes. Our universal remotes make your life easy!

profile:
SetupTeam is Proudly Canadian Toronto based company that offers Professional Service for commercial and residential clients. We service and Insured for both Residential and Commercial customers. Our technicians have years of experience in the installation of TV's, Home theater and the IT industry. Every installation is always on time and on budget.
When a technician leaves your property everything will be cleaned-up double checked and running. All of our technicians are fully trained, insured, bonded Criminal Record Checked non-smokers and show the greatest respect when working in your home or offices


***

We specialize in:

***

*TV wall mounting 
*Commercial TV installation and set-up 
*Home theater installation
*Systems integrated for smart homes and offices 
*Structured Cabling and Networking 
*Wifi Setup and Enhancement 
*Pre-construction consulting and planning
*IT and AV Project management 

***

For YOUR safety and peace of mind. Call us today for more info
